title: When TNA lives in Colombo and ‘Eelam’ is elsewhere
content: – by Shenali D Waduge – Let’s explore a very simple question. Exactly how does the TNA propose to give dignity to the Tamils by living away from them? Do they propose to run ‘Eelam’ by remote control from Colombo? How many trips have the chief ministerial candidate made to Sri Lanka’s North or even…
